mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, realname, email, mobilephone, fixed_phone, dept_id, create_time, status
mapper.select: select su.user_id userId, su.username username, su.corp_id corpId, su.mobilephone mobilephone from sys_user su left join corp_dept d on su.dept_id=d.dept_id where su.username=#{username} and su.password=#{password} and su.status=1 limit 1

select su.user_id userId, su.username username, d.corp_id corpId, su.mobilephone mobilephone from sys_user su left join corp_dept d on su.dept_id=d.dept_id where su.mobilephone=#{mobilephone} and su.status=1 limit 1
select count(1) from sys_user where username=#{username} and status=1
select count(1) from sys_user where mobilephone=#{mobilephone} and status=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_biz_log ( log_id, user_id, interface_id, ip, content, oper_time ) values (#{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ip},#{content},now() )
mapper.select: select interface_id, interface_name, path, method, access_status, note, create_time from sys_func_interface
select path_id, path_rule, path_name, note, create_time from upload_file_path
select item_key itemKey, item_value itemValue, module_name moduleName, item_note itemNote from sys_config
select item_key itemKey, item_value itemValue, module_name moduleName, item_note itemNote from sys_config where item_key = #{itemKey}
